item.description:
Welcome to the Boston Fashion Meetup Group.
Our mission is to cultivate a strong Boston fashion community through collaboration, outreach, and entrepreneurship.
Join other Boston area fashion professionals, entrepreneurs and businesspeople for networking, lively discussions, events, informative panels, workshops, fashion photo shoots, and more!
Whether youâ€™re a seasoned professional, a newcomer, a student, own a business, freelance, or just love fashion; this group has much to offer and gain from you.
Become a member and see what this fantastic group is all about!
item.name: The Boston Fashion Meetup Group
